spotify.title: Spotify 2.0
spotify.description: Additional features, improvements, and data tracking using the Spotify API.

album_display.title: Album Artwork Display
album_display.description: Custom built monitor display to display all of my favorite songs and album art.

neon_signs.title: Neon Signs
neon_signs.description: Custom made LED neon signs with 3D printed enclosures.

langtons_ant.title: Langton's Ant Generator
langtons_ant.description: Simple UI to generate Langton's Ant patterns. Allows users to specify the size of the pattern, the direction of the ant, the number of iterations, the color scheme, and the starting position.

chess_board.title: Chess Board Display
chess_board.description: Custom 3D printed wall decor that "plays" through chess games

christmas_tree.title: Christmas Tree
christmas_tree.description: A Christmas tree with 3D mapped locations for every light to be individually addressed.

hexagon_lights.title: Hexagon Lights
hexagon_lights.description: Display piece with individually addressable LED lights mapped to a hexagonal grid.

liquor_shelf.title: Liquor Shelf
liquor_shelf.description: Custom wooden shelf with LED diffused shelves.

chess_pieces.title: Chess Pieces
chess_pieces.description: Custom 3D printed quadruple weighted chess pieces.

rugs.title: Rugs
rugs.description: A collection of custom rugs I have made.

infinity_bottles.title: Infinity Bottles
infinity_bottles.description: My continual growing infinity bottles of rum and whiskey.
